channel.title: Having Trouble Help!
channel.description: My Windows Xp is corrupt and i need a bunch of firewall that can open ports for my server and i want it to open port so Uttorent works and lets my server allow people to connect to my server please help! :(

item.title: Having Trouble Help!
item.dc:creator: @force force
item.description:
@force wrote:

You make no sense to me, how is your windows corrupt?

All you need to do to port-forward is connect to router and create the forwards which are directed at your internal IP.

Next time before posting use a great tool called google. It solves 1000 problems so you don’t have to post stupid questions

Read full topic

item.title: Having Trouble Help!
item.dc:creator: @_Worx `Worx
item.description:
@_Worx wrote:

l.o.l:

My Windows Xp is corrupt and i need a bunch of firewall that can open ports for my server and i want it to open port so Uttorent works and lets my server allow people to connect to my server please help!

You need to portforward.

But if your OS is corrupt, i suggest re-formatting your hard drive with a newer version so your whole machine doesn’t fuck itself over.

Read full topic
